description:
\[17]<反击避免：10%>\[18]<精准：20>\c[0] 高度附魔的长枪，牺牲一定锋利度提升了魔法攻击属性
装备要求不低于5级，且魔法攻击高于物理攻击的一半
name: 火炼尖锋枪
note:
<Not Independent Item>
<Menu Category: 武器>
<Text Color: 9>
<ZzyGIT TextColor: #1E90FF>
<ZzySCF Color: #1E90FF>
<Passive State: 268>
<Target Counter: -10%>

<Equip Requirement>
   param >= 5
</Equip Requirement>

  <Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
   if (user.level >= 5 &&
       user.atk/user.mat <= 2) {
     condition = true;
   } else {
     condition = false;
   }
  </Custom Equip Requirement Condition>


<ZzyYEC Eq Start>
user._precise = user._precise || 0;
user._precise += 20;
user._precise = Math.max(0, user._precise);
user._precise = Math.min(500, user._precise);
<ZzyYEC Eq End>

<ZzyYEC UnEq Start>
user._precise = user._precise || 0;
user._precise -= 20;
user._precise = Math.max(0, user._precise);
user._precise = Math.min(500, user._precise);
<ZzyYEC UnEq End>
